duration.Description: Trial stimulus presentation time in seconds

Levels.Congruent: Word and facial emotion are congruent
Levels.Incongruent: Word and facial emotion are incongruent

Levels.pCI: postcongruent incongruent - congruent trial followed by incongruent trial
Levels.pII: postincongruent incongruent - incongruent trial followed by incongruent trial

target_condition.Description: Target facial emotion presented to participants

distractor.Description: Distractor text overlayed on target facial emotion during trial

response.Description: Response made by participant (identify the underlying facial emotion while ignoring an overlaying emotion word)

database.Description: NIMH Child Emotional Faces Picture Set (NIMH-ChEFS). See Egger et al, 2011 (https://doi.org/10.1002/mpr.343)
